caller_intent: The caller (Gary) sought clarification on insurance options, specifically comparing Auto Owners Insurance and Progressive, and wanted to understand how his roof's age (2021 installation) affects coverage and premium calculations.
resolution_steps: Agent Lynn Miller reviewed the caller's previous message and pulled up relevant information.
Explained Auto Owners Insurance premium ($1,666 for full payment) and Progressive's coverage limitations for roofs older than four years.
Clarified that Progressive's depreciation policy would reduce roof coverage after the four-year anniversary (2025).
Recommended Auto Owners as the best available option due to rate and coverage compatibility.
knowledge_required: Homeowners insurance coverage rules (roof depreciation timelines)
summary: Agent Lynn Miller advised Gary on insurance options, explaining why Auto Owners Insurance was preferable to Progressive for his situation due to roof age-related coverage limitations. The call concluded with a recommendation for Auto Owners as the best rate available.
